name: Root Buster
description:
Root Buster is a short game made in 48 for KrakJam2023. This is a postapo action platformer where your aim is to grow your crops. But be vary! Radioactive roots will try to destroy them.

Lore

As the world approached the apocalypse, the forces of nature took over, entities came out of the ground to bring about the failure of the earth, few wanted to fight this power, but there was a farmer who is not afraid to fight even at the cost of his life.

How to play

  • AD / Arrows - Move Left/Right
  • W / Space - Jump
  • E - Interaction
  • Left Mouse Button - Attack

Credits
